title: Old dreamcast logo font
content:
crappy wrong title - and you cant edit it.....   
   
I am finding myself doing a lot of brochure work at the moment and would like some advice. Could you suggest some fonts for usage with body text. I have been using info, rotis and helvetica and i was just wondering if you knew of any other decent ones.
author: japanmik

comments.content:
Dean Allen has a good list of 20.   
   
 [http://www.textism.com/textfaces/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221521/http:/www.textism.com/textfaces/)
